p: To the solution of 3-[3-(2-chloro-4-pyrimidinyl)-6-fluoropyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-2-yl]aniline (0.31 g) (prepared from N-{3-[3-(2-chloro-4-pyrimidinyl)-4-fluoropyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-2-yl]phenyl}-2,2,2-trifluoroacetamide obtained Example 168, Step B using a protocol similar to that described in Example 168, Step C) in THF (10 mL) was added 2,6-difluorobenzoyl chloride (0.19 g). The reaction was kept stirring at rt for 0.5 h and worked up with sat. NaHCO 3 solution (8 mL). After extraction with EtOAc (2 X 10 mL), drying with Na 2SO 4, and concentration, the crude mixture was purified through silica gel column chromatography to afford N-{3-[3-(2-chloro-4-pyrimidinyl)-6-fluoropyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-2-yl]phenyl}-2,6-difluorobenzamide as a yellow solid (0.43 g, 96%). ESIMS (M+H) + = 480.
